CustomField.description: An action link to schedule back-promotions
CustomField.formula: IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c != 'none', IF( TEXT(copado__Back_Promotion_Behavior__c) == 'Scheduled', HYPERLINK("/apex/copado__ScheduleConnectionBehavior?id=" + Id + "&promotionType=Back_Promotion", IF( ISBLANK(copado__Back_Promotion_Schedule__c), "Schedule Back-Promotion", copado__Back_Promotion_Schedule__c),'_self'), ''), IF( TEXT(copado__Back_Promotion_Behavior__c) == 'Scheduled', HYPERLINK("/apex/ScheduleConnectionBehavior?id=" + Id + "&promotionType=Back_Promotion", IF( ISBLANK(copado__Back_Promotion_Schedule__c), "Schedule Back-Promotion", copado__Back_Promotion_Schedule__c),'_self'), '') )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: An action link to schedule back-promotions
CustomField.label: Schedule Back-Promotions
